select count(*) from smppInfo where bEnabled = 1;

select top 1000 ID as id, SendID as sendId, SendMobile as phone, SendContent as content, smppID as taskId, bProcess as status, SendCount as sendCount from TaskInfo where bProcess = 0 and SendCount !> 200;
